downloadTitle: System Center 2019 Integration Pack for HP iLO and OA
downloadDescription: The Integration Pack for HP Lights-Out (iLO) and Onboard Administrator (OA) is an add-on for System Center 2019 - Orchestrator that enables you to automate HP iLO and OA commands.
detailsSection:
The Integration Pack for HP iLO and OA is an add-on for System Center 2019 Orchestrator that enables you to create activities within runbooks that make requests to the HP iLO and OA products to get data or perform functions.

Feature Summary
This integration pack adds the HP iLO and OA category to the Activities pane in the Runbook Designer. This category contains the following activities:
  • Run iLO Command
  • Run OA Command

Release History
  • 2nd April 2019 - Original English release, version 10.19.19.
systemRequirementsSection:
Other Software: System Center 2019 - Orchestrator and future releases

    Other Requirements:
    • RAM – minimum 1GB recommended 2GB
    • Disk space minimum 200MB
    • CPU Dual Core or better
    • .Net 3.5
installInstructionSection: Download the package and extract the files to your computer by running the .exe.

relatedResourcesSection.title: hp iLO and OA Integration Pack
